title: FailedToInsertEth1Block(InconsistentTimestamp (Nethermind / Kintsugi)
body:
## Description

Repeatedly seeing `FailedToInsertEth1Block(InconsistentTimestamp` in the beacon

## Version

unstable
9be3d4ecac89d3700ebdd7c873e6c4ce6016176a

## Present Behaviour


Sorry just saw this issue. This is a bug on nethermind where they seem to be storing a bad block in their canonical block tree. I have created a issue on nethermind to track this https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/issues/3740
I'll close this one for now since it seems to be a Nethermind issue. Thanks @SeaMonkey82 and @pawanjay176!
